job03.title: Marketing Director

job03.li2: Oversaw marketing plans, budgets and best tactics for conversion
job03.li3: Utilized SEO and SEM to grow traffic and engagement

job04.title: Manager of Sales and Marketing Support

job04.li3: Strategized marketing plans and created marketing collateral

job05.title: Owner

job06.title: Owner
